website_summaries.verdict: A brush specially designed for use on American Girl dolls. One of the best tools for caring for these pricey toys.
pros: Size and design work well with any American Girl doll
Bristles are evenly spaced and the right length for the texture of the dolls' hair
cons: Center piece has been known to pop out

customer_reviews.title: Yes, dolls need a special brush
customer_reviews.text: It's true -- American Girl dolls' hair needs a special brush. Now, I'm guessing any wire-bristled brush would do, but since my oldest doll's hair is a disaster because I used a plastic-bristled brush on it all the time, I decided not to take a risk with my new dolls and just get an official AG one. This works well not just for smoothing the hair, but for curling it (the dolls' hair is pliable enough that you can at least sort of get a curl just by twirling it around the brush).
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: but it is really crappy quality considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Kids don't seem to mind, but it is really crappy quality considering the price. One of the metal bristles fell out within a few minutes of my daughter brushing her dolls hair. A bristle on the second brush I ordered bent after 1 day of use. Doesn't seem like these will last too long. Better off buying a brush with metal bristles at a regular store. I got sucked into buying it because it was "American Girl." I will never by this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne McLaughlan

customer_reviews.title: Bristles bent every which way, catches on hai
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, I found that this brush arrived with the metal bristles bent every which way, with some overlapping each other. When combed through the American Girl doll’s hair, it pulled out a lot of hair. I instead bought the less expensive Sophia’s doll wire wig brush, which turns out to have more even bristles set in a softer and more flexible rubber base, and is gentler on the doll’s hair.
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: my 5 year old can brush the AG dolls hair but for $8 I assumed the quality would be a lot better. The metal bristles are pointing in all different ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush is really poorly made. It gets the job done, my 5 year old can brush the AG dolls hair but for $8 I assumed the quality would be a lot better. The metal bristles are pointing in all different direction and seem like one wrong move and they will snap,
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best doll hairbrush ever
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush is amazing I really didn't think a doll hairbrush could work it turned all the girls American dolls back into brand-new we also used it on some fake hair my 13-year-old daughter had to wear for a dance recital I thought we would have to go get her brand-new hair again but after using the American girl doll brush on the hairpiece it to look like brand-new again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: bent bristles
customer_reviews.text: The brush arrived with several of the bristles bent and pointing in the wrong direction. I tried straightening them a bit, but the first time my daughter used it to comb through her AG doll's hair several of the bristles fell out. (Both from the bent bristles and the normal ones.) I'm super disappointed in the quality, but what makes me most mad is that it says I can't return it. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Our Generation brush is the same design and half the price - neither are great for protecting the dolls hair
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what other reviews have said, this brush DOES pull the dolls hair out and is totally over priced for what it is. The Our Generation brush is the same design and half the price - neither are great for protecting the dolls hair. will be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F. Lyle

customer_reviews.title: This brush works for doll hair
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about this brush sooner. My daughter unfortunately has a few dolls with bald spots because I didn’t have the right brush. This one works way better than anything else I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Weibel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Comb for American Dolls and other dolls. The comb seems sturdy and should last.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: perfect brush for the American Girl Doll.
customer_reviews.text: We asked how do you take care of her hair after the first day. We were told by friends that have these dolls that you really need to get the official brush. We ordered it right away and had it in 3 days. It really does work. Her hair is now easy to take care of but still needs to be done by the adults in the family not the 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: AG brush with Prime shipping? Yes please.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that I could get an AG brand brush with Prime shipping. It works great on my daughter’s AG doll’s hair
customer_reviews.author: toothfairyjenny

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to put with an AGD for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put with an AGD for a granddaughter because it does keep the hair neat when brushed. However, after looking at the brush, I could have purchased a similar one at a retail store for less than half the price I paid online (and then had to add shipping charges).
customer_reviews.author: Piedmont coach

customer_reviews.title: Just okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is not amazing quality, as one might expect for the price. However, it does say "American Girl" on the handle. It doesn't appear to be a brush that will last particularly well, except for the framework.
customer_reviews.author: Lochaber25

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Product was as shown in photos My daughter loves it and makes brushing doll hair so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for doll hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this brush-perfect size for her hand and works great on her dolls hair
customer_reviews.author: amanda roosa

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Product was filthy with dead bugs in the packaging. Sent back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected this brush to be of American Girl quality, but this brush is far from durable and the bristles are feeble.
customer_reviews.author: E.Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Granddaugther
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love her brush to keep her American Girl Babies hair beautiful
customer_reviews.author: MJ, Dallas, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for dolly’s hair!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My 5 yr. old granddaughter loves this brush for her American Girl doll. The doll’s hair truly was gorgeous after she used the brush.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy doll brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for the American girl doll. I found a doll at the flea market and when I used this brush her hair was like new.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: This is a good brush but had two of the bristles fall off ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brush but had two of the bristles fall off during first use. This may be because the doll's hair was too tangled. Haven't had any more fall off. Overall I'm pleased. Just use carefully if your doll's hair is really bad. I used detangler to help.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey

customer_reviews.title: But it looks nice and does a good job with the dolls' hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter brushes her dolls' hair often. Her old AG brush broke (after 2 yrs) when the plastic in the center came out. I had to replace it with this brush. I think it could be made a bit more substantial to last longer. But it looks nice and does a good job with the dolls' hair.
customer_reviews.author: C Bass

customer_reviews.title: but informed me that it don't work on her doll because it has curly hair not straight hair like some of the dolls
customer_reviews.text: Grand Daughter just loves her new brush for her American Girls doll, but informed me that it don't work on her doll because it has curly hair not straight hair like some of the dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works great! Who knew the doll needed her own brush!
customer_reviews.author: Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Best for your doll
customer_reviews.text: Glad I could order this through Amazon. I was at the American Girl Store the other day and forgot to buy one. This brush really works better than any other bush with the American Girl Doll.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: great brush
customer_reviews.text: this is a must have if you have any American girl doll, but it works great on all my daughter's other dolls hair too. worth the cost sturdy and will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: blynch35

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for doll hair
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found this. Works well on doll hair.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: American Girl hair brush. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, no bent wires. It does make the dolls hair look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this brush! Works perfect for our AG doll hair!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Like a real vent brush
customer_reviews.text: This is like a real vent brush. Sooo well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped quickly and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and works like a charm. Saved me a long drive to the American Girl store, too! :) (And the possibility of darling daughter wanting to buy MORE things!)
customer_reviews.author: HockeyMom

customer_reviews.title: it fell apart the first time we used it on her doll's hair and it wasn't particularly messy!
customer_reviews.text: The metal bristles started coming out immediately. I requested a return and refund but then put it off to the side and forgot that I was waiting on the return and now it's too late. This should have held up past the first stroke of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S. Shaffner

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my daughter's doll's hair. Way better than using a regular hair brush!
customer_reviews.author: Butterbean

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. We’ve used it twice and it broke and all the wires fell out Not worth the money at all! Amazon won’t let you return or refund either! I would give it zero stars if that was an option
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sewell

customer_reviews.title: This will come in handy keeping the American Doll's hair ...
customer_reviews.text: This will come in handy keeping the American Doll's hair neat and tidy. I am sure my granddaughter will get much use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia Mae

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a dime.
customer_reviews.text: Received on Sunday and my daughter brushed her dolls hair once through and the brush broke. Rubber base pulled right out and silver bristles came out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush really works on my granddaughter's American girl doll. The dolls hair is so soft and silky.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bristles already coming out of brush...it does help with the dolls hair.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Fast service, packaging new and intact. Brush exactly as pictured. It still can pull out doll hair, but careful brushing reduces damage to hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Amy Hueard

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter has two American Girl dolls and needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has two American Girl dolls and needed to replace the brush she had. She was thrilled when Santa brought her one with the American Girl name on it! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dettmers

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for my daughter's American Girl doll. Both efficient and gentle. Got the tangles right out! Perfect! Would not recommend any other brush.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Necessary tool!
customer_reviews.text: If you have an American Girl doll , this is absolutely necessary for her hair. Anything else will destroy the hair which is what happened to my daughter when she used a regular brush instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hair brush was a great hit and countless hours spent using it by a young American Girl collector.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G

customer_reviews.title: Great hairbrush for dolls
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the brush and it does well on My Life and American Girl dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barnes

customer_reviews.title: ... a little water and patience got the hair looking great.
customer_reviews.text: With a little water and patience got the hair looking great.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all doll hair brushing
customer_reviews.text: Same the one I lost. Great for all doll hair brushing.

customer_reviews.title: Doll brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brush to use with American Girl Dolls hair.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this is the best brush my dolls hair looks brand new. must buy. good quality.

customer_reviews.title: I am now her favorite Grandma!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with my Granddaughter! I am now her favorite Grandma!!
customer_reviews.author: RetiredAndLovingIt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have with any AG doll! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, paint is already chipping off and just purchased, not the quality I expect from American Girl Doll brand.
customer_reviews.author: P.D. from Cali

customer_reviews.title: Brush falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it's not so much a problem with the brush but with the American Girl doll hair. I mean, can they use worse quality hair? I don't think it's possible. When we paid $125 for a doll with hair to style, we assumed the quality would be at least marginally acceptable. But this hair is stiff as straw and the brush totally buckles under the pressure. After 4 uses, the metal bristles began to bend and pop out. It's very sad they wouldn't offer better quality all around. Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe that this brush makes such a difference, but it works wonders on American girl dolls.
customer_reviews.author: MoeMoe

customer_reviews.title: What can I say its the American Doll Brush
customer_reviews.text: American Doll brush ONLY for my daughters American Doll. Its a nice brush.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gotto

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: do not buy. very poor quality and will not last. already falling apart after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It's very well made. 4 stars because I felt it was slightly overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Christeen Broaddus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it but a little expensive for a doll brush!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Baldassare

customer_reviews.title: Kind of pricey
customer_reviews.text: Works great for American Girl dolls. My granddaughters love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this new brush for her American Girl dolls! This brush does not remove the curl and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: myra sparacio

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but slight problem
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses, one of the wires fell out. Could have been a fluke though. No rough usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush. It is small enough to fit in my daughter's hand and big enough to effectively brush her American Girl doll's hair. It doesn't pull the hair out and even works with minor knots. This brush is good enough that its almost addictive. My daughter bought one for a friend for Christmas and her friends mother actually spent 45 minutes just brushing the doll's hair! It's not too expensive and it's a great addition to any girl's lady toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for doll hair
customer_reviews.text: This made my daughter's doll hair look like it did when we brought it home from the store. We brushed gently but a decent amount of hair came out of the doll. One of the brush wire needles also came out of the brush upon its first use.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The brush is scratched and has a chunk missing. It appears to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This brush is junk!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush to go with my 7 year olds brand new American Girl Doll. It fell apart the first time she used it on her new doll with tangle free hair. I did not realize that some American Girl accessories are made in China, I expected better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Item was very reasonably priced & of high quality! Item also arrived as scheduled!!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: what can you say.
customer_reviews.text: It was what she needed to keep her dolls hair nice. Think she was happy with it. Not much you can say about a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Hart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging and the product came in great condition. My daughter loves it and it is very essential for the American dolls hair. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Clo

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lost her other AG brush. I thought it was just misplaced so I didn't buy another the other day while at the AG store. So glad I was able to order on Amazon. This brush works great. Don't forget to wet your doll's hair before brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Scarl8Begonias

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: If you have an American Girl doll or other doll, a good brush for their hair is important. Brushing with the brush will keep the hair from frizzing. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on AGD, My Little Pony, and Barbie hair. It has held up so very well. I bought other ones at the same time to compare, and this one by far is my favorite. I don't typically buy into the whole AGD movement :) , but this product is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Irwin

customer_reviews.title: A brush for a doll... sigh.
customer_reviews.text: If a doll must have a brush, then this would be the one to have, right? The super tangled AG hair is rough on this brush and the bristles move and twist which is frustrating, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnston7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other brushes on American girl hair but this is the only one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Best doll brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a real American Girl brush. You have to use them on the doll hair as to not pull it all out with a regular brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Came in packaging that was opened like it was already returned. Very disappointed. The bristles were bent too.
customer_reviews.author: itali614

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received Hair brush but not American Girl hair brush & at same price
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Ange

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Brush was a huge dissapointment. My 12year old used it for the first time and two pins came out. For a $20.00 brush way too expensive and disfunctional, not recommended at all. I live outside the US so returning it will be far nor expensive but if I could, I would return it. Don't buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is still hard to brush the AG dolls hair. I also saw this brush for $7 on the AG website after I bought it here for $14.
customer_reviews.author: hoopie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works so well with any doll hair. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ARabbit

product_meta.title: American Girl - Hair Brush for Dolls
product_meta.description: This wire wig brush can comb through tangles for Your American Girl Doll lustrous, beautiful hair.;American Girl Official Logo printed on hairbrush.;Light weight, handy to carry with your American Girl to everywhere.;Make your American Girl doll hair Style easy with this American Girl doll Hair Brush.;dimension of this American Girl Doll Hair Brush 6 x 1.5 x 1.5
